fields.title: Harris 1991 Americans with Disabilities Survey, study no. 912028

dsDescription.dsDescriptionValue: This is survey focuses on public attitudes toward disabled persons and their knowledge of the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990. Variables include discrimination, job opportunities, equal pay, access in public places, and government assistance.

fields.notesText: Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: National cross-section of U.S. adults 18 years and older.; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:ACCESS.CATEGORY  Notes: I; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:CODEBOOK.NUMBER  Notes: H-912028;

distributor.distributorName: Odum Institute for Research in Social Science
